CustomField.description: Conversation Qualified Lead (CQL) score applied to the contact in the Drift conversation. Values between [-1, 3] correspond to the number of CQL lightning bolts. -1 means Disqualified, 0 means No score.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Conversation Qualified Lead (CQL) score applied to the contact in the Drift conversation. Values between [-1, 3] correspond to the number of CQL lightning bolts. -1 means Disqualified, 0 means No score.
CustomField.label: CQL Score
